attributes.action: Give serving and ex armed forces personnel tax relief.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a former soldier, i find it abohorent that this country does not provide some form of tax benefit for serving and ex service personnel with clear service records.
this tax break ould be dpendant of time of service but not rstrictive of force i.e. army navy air force, or reservist.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give serving and ex armed forces personnel tax relief."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20292


Prime Minister's Office
